android.provider
Interface Telephony.ThreadsColumns

All Superinterfaces:
BaseColumns
All Known Implementing Classes:
Telephony.Threads
Enclosing class:
Telephony
public static interface Telephony.ThreadsColumns
extends BaseColumns

Columns for the "threads" table used by MMS and SMS.

Field Summary
static String DATE
          The date at which the thread was created.
static String ERROR
          Indicates whether there is a transmission error in the thread.
static String MESSAGE_COUNT
          The message count of the thread.
static String READ
          Indicates whether all messages of the thread have been read.
static String RECIPIENT_IDS
          A string encoding of the recipient IDs of the recipients of the message, in numerical order and separated by spaces.
static String SNIPPET
          The snippet of the latest message in the thread.
static String SNIPPET_CHARSET
          The charset of the snippet.
static String TYPE
          Type of the thread, either Threads.COMMON_THREAD or Threads.BROADCAST_THREAD.
 
Fields inherited from interface android.provider.BaseColumns
_COUNT, _ID
